comment: One direction of a simplified definition of substitution. The converse requires either a disjoint variable condition ( ~ sb5 ) or a non-freeness hypothesis ( ~ sb5f ). (Contributed by NM, 13-May-1993.) Revise ~ df-sb . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 29-Jul-2023.)
